text: 6|122|(vilcci ataintu) maranittavarkalaka iruntavarkalil evarai nam uyirppittu manitarkalukkitaiyil natamatuvatarkuriya oliyaiyum kotuttirukkinromo avar, irulil cikki atiliruntu veliyera mutiyamaliruppavanukkuc camamavara? Ivvare nirakarippavarkalukku avarkalutaiya (tiya)ceyalkal alakakkappattu vittana
